label: 三部
本: Saichō:  the Establishment of the Japanese Tendai  . Asian Humanities Press (University of Hawai'i Press) . 1984 (2000)
説明文: sanbu sanmaya 三部三昧耶　(three vows or symbols):  1.  Three parts of the initiation: Butsubu(Buddha), Rengebu (Lotus), and Kongōbu(Diamond) [仏部、蓮華部、金剛部]; 2. Three traditions of taimitsu[台密]:  Diamond Realm, Womb Realm, and Soshitsuji.  3.  Three divisions of the Womb Realm transmission.
